title: MediaPlaybackStateChange
description: Browser-specific. Schema representing a change to the playback state of the media associated with an <audio> or <video> element.

oneOf.title: PlaybackStatePlaying
oneOf.description: A playback state indicating that the associated media is playing.

oneOf.title: PlaybackStatePaused
oneOf.description: A playback state indicating that the associated media is paused.
